1.0.0.en: Initial version of a standalone app for Yeelights. Please migrate your devices from the Xiaomi Mi Home app to this dedicated Yeelights app.

1.0.1.en: Initial version of a standalone app for Yeelights. Please migrate your devices from the Xiaomi Mi Home app to this dedicated Yeelights app.

1.0.2.en: Fix for Yeelights that have been online and come online again.

1.0.3.en: Small fixes to improve pairing process and avoid crashes when removing Yeelight devices.
